content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (53.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) extracting coal
- Wooden Chests at positions (52.5, -84.5) and (54.5, -84.5) storing coal

### Copper Plate Production Facility at Positions (-20.0, -70.0) and (-21.0, -62.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-20.0, -70.0) and (-21.0, -62.0) processing copper ore into copper plates
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) supplying copper ore
- Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) storing copper ore
- Transport Belts connecting the mining drill to the furnaces

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) (currently not operational due to lack of ingredients)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-14.5, -54.5) and (-12.5, -54.5) storing iron ore and copper plates
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) transferring items between entities

### Iron Plate Storage Facility at Position (-16.5, -64.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (-16.5, -64.5) storing iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (-15.5, -64.5) transferring items

### Miscellaneous Storage and Transport
- Multiple Wooden Chests scattered across various positions storing different resources
- Several Belt Groups facilitating the transport of items between different entities

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Inserters Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source entity has items available for the inserter to pick up. Check inventory levels and ensure continuous supply.

### Errors with Inserters Waiting for Space in Destination
- Ensure that the destination entity has space to accept items from the inserter. Regularly clear out or process items in destination entities to prevent blockages.

### Errors with Furnaces Lacking Ingredients
- Regularly supply necessary ingredients to furnaces to maintain continuous production. Monitor ingredient levels and automate supply chains where possible.
